CaptureContentTypeHeader.description: Configuration specifying how to treat different headers. If no headers are specified SageMaker will by default base64 encode when capturing the data.

properties.name: CsvContentTypes
properties.description: The list of all content type headers that SageMaker will treat as CSV and capture accordingly.

type.description: The list of all content type headers that SageMaker will treat as CSV and capture accordingly.

properties.name: JsonContentTypes
properties.description: The list of all content type headers that SageMaker will treat as JSON and capture accordingly.

type.description: The list of all content type headers that SageMaker will treat as JSON and capture accordingly.

DataStorageConfig.description: The Amazon S3 location and configuration for storing inference request and response data.

properties.name: Destination
properties.description: The Amazon S3 bucket where the inference request and response data is stored.

type.description: The Amazon S3 bucket where the inference request and response data is stored.

properties.name: KmsKey
properties.description: The AWS Key Management Service key that Amazon SageMaker uses to encrypt captured data at rest using Amazon S3 server-side encryption.

type.description: The AWS Key Management Service key that Amazon SageMaker uses to encrypt captured data at rest using Amazon S3 server-side encryption.

EndpointMetadata.description: The metadata of the endpoint on which the inference experiment ran.

properties.name: EndpointConfigName
properties.description: The name of the endpoint configuration.

type.description: The name of the endpoint configuration.

properties.name: EndpointStatus
properties.description: The status of the endpoint. For possible values of the status of an endpoint.

type.description: The status of the endpoint. For possible values of the status of an endpoint.

EndpointName.description: The name of the endpoint used to run the inference experiment.

InferenceExperimentSchedule.description: The duration for which you want the inference experiment to run.

properties.name: EndTime
properties.description: The timestamp at which the inference experiment ended or will end.

type.description: The timestamp at which the inference experiment ended or will end.

properties.name: StartTime
properties.description: The timestamp at which the inference experiment started or will start.

type.description: The timestamp at which the inference experiment started or will start.

ModelInfrastructureConfig.description: The configuration for the infrastructure that the model will be deployed to.

properties.name: InfrastructureType
properties.description: The type of the inference experiment that you want to run.

type.description: The type of the inference experiment that you want to run.

ModelVariantConfig.description: Contains information about the deployment options of a model.

properties.name: ModelName
properties.description: The name of the Amazon SageMaker Model entity.

type.description: The name of the Amazon SageMaker Model entity.

properties.name: VariantName
properties.description: The name of the variant.

type.description: The name of the variant.

RealTimeInferenceConfig.description: The infrastructure configuration for deploying the model to a real-time inference endpoint.

properties.name: InstanceCount
properties.description: The number of instances of the type specified by InstanceType.

type.description: The number of instances of the type specified by InstanceType.

properties.name: InstanceType
properties.description: The instance type the model is deployed to.

type.description: The instance type the model is deployed to.

ShadowModeConfig.description: The configuration of ShadowMode inference experiment type. Use this field to specify a production variant which takes all the inference requests, and a shadow variant to which Amazon SageMaker replicates a percentage of the inference requests. For the shadow variant also specify the percentage of requests that Amazon SageMaker replicates.

properties.name: ShadowModelVariants
properties.description: List of shadow variant configurations.

type.description: List of shadow variant configurations.

properties.name: SourceModelVariantName
properties.description: The name of the production variant, which takes all the inference requests.

type.description: The name of the production variant, which takes all the inference requests.

ShadowModelVariantConfig.description: The name and sampling percentage of a shadow variant.

properties.name: SamplingPercentage
properties.description: The percentage of inference requests that Amazon SageMaker replicates from the production variant to the shadow variant.

type.description: The percentage of inference requests that Amazon SageMaker replicates from the production variant to the shadow variant.

properties.name: ShadowModelVariantName
properties.description: The name of the shadow variant.

type.description: The name of the shadow variant.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 127 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 127 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 255 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 255 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: The description of the inference experiment.

type.description: The description of the inference experiment.

properties.name: DesiredState
properties.description: The desired state of the experiment after starting or stopping operation.

type.description: The desired state of the experiment after starting or stopping operation.

properties.name: KmsKey
properties.description: The AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) key that Amazon SageMaker uses to encrypt data on the storage volume attached to the ML compute instance that hosts the endpoint.

type.description: The AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) key that Amazon SageMaker uses to encrypt data on the storage volume attached to the ML compute instance that hosts the endpoint.

properties.name: ModelVariants
properties.description: An array of ModelVariantConfig objects. Each ModelVariantConfig object in the array describes the infrastructure configuration for the corresponding variant.

type.description: An array of ModelVariantConfig objects. Each ModelVariantConfig object in the array describes the infrastructure configuration for the corresponding variant.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name for the inference experiment.

type.description: The name for the inference experiment.

properties.name: RoleArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that Amazon SageMaker can assume to access model artifacts and container images, and manage Amazon SageMaker Inference endpoints for model deployment.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that Amazon SageMaker can assume to access model artifacts and container images, and manage Amazon SageMaker Inference endpoints for model deployment.

properties.name: StatusReason
properties.description: The error message or client-specified reason from the StopInferenceExperiment API, that explains the status of the inference experiment.

type.description: The error message or client-specified reason from the StopInferenceExperiment API, that explains the status of the inference experiment.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: The type of the inference experiment that you want to run.

type.description: The type of the inference experiment that you want to run.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the inference experiment.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the inference experiment.

properties.name: CreationTime
properties.description: The timestamp at which you created the inference experiment.

type.description: The timestamp at which you created the inference experiment.

properties.name: LastModifiedTime
properties.description: The timestamp at which you last modified the inference experiment.

type.description: The timestamp at which you last modified the inference experiment.

properties.name: Status
properties.description: The status of the inference experiment.

type.description: The status of the inference experiment.
